art.post: Why, oh why are we arguing about everything and where is our Faith and Belief? Even Jesus instructed the disciples about little children and the fact that we (adults) must have the faith of a child. What aren’t you getting?  I believe no matter if it came from a child or from an older person because who am I to discount what they went through?
